title: [Ahrairah's Weaponry]
[Ahrairah's Outfitting]
[Ahrairah's Magic Shoppe]
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is a carved oak table on one side of the shop and a twisted dark metal rack on the other.
